roleset.name: electing again
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, reelect.01. Corresponds to VNcls appoint-29.1.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: While Americans took a step forward in social liberalism with their reelection of Obama and rising support for social policies such as gay marriage and immigration reform, politics in Europe has taken a dangerous turn to the right.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: The NJDC congratulates Bill Nelson on his reelection to Senate, calling him â€œa key ally to the Florida Jewish community ...
